solution_line_template: He spent {num_women}*{time_per_woman}=<<{num_women}*{time_per_woman}={women_time}>>{women_time} minutes cutting women's hair.
He spent {num_men}*{time_per_man}=<<{num_men}*{time_per_man}={men_time}>>{men_time} minutes cutting men's hair.
He spent {num_kids}*{time_per_kid}=<<{num_kids}*{time_per_kid}={kids_time}>>{kids_time} minutes cutting children's hair.
He spent a total of {women_time}+{men_time}+{kids_time}=<<{women_time}+{men_time}+{kids_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes.
